title: JosephJoestar的分级图标仓库
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start]]
**作品名称：** JosephJoestar的分级图标仓库

**作者：**[[*user josephjoestar]]

**作者页：**[[[josephauthorpage |我的人事档案]]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end]]
这里是完全由我个人制作的**项目等级**图标，除了[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/esoteric-classes-complete-list 机密分级]以外也包含普通的分级如Keter和Safe

__**这些图标我个人感觉并不适合用于ACS，只是用来看看就好**__[[footnote]] 所以也请不要用ACS图标的标准来评判它们，偏激一点的话这些图标和ACS**没有一点关系** [[/footnote]]：首先我没有把它们周围的白色区域调成透明，其次已经有更厉害的人的在我之前把它们做出来了，见[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/more-acs-icons 这里]和[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/component:anomaly-class-bar#toc14 这里][[footnote]] 如你所见，我的技术力相形见绌 [[/footnote]]——如果你真的想用的话，我很欢迎，不过可能会很麻烦

本页所有图片遵从CC-BY-SA 3.0协议，拿图不必跟我说，注明即可（好像真的有人会用一样

如有批评或改进意见，可以在wiki私信我或讨论区提出

我大概会时不时更新这个页面加点新东西进去，毕竟机密分级还有一大堆呢（

如果你想找我做一个LOGO（不一定是某个分级的）的话可以wiki私信或者讨论区提出。我的QQ是3328097699，为了区分请添加时在备注里注明你的wiki ID，当然，我可能经常不在线（笑

欢迎白嫖

代码是偷kc的（被打
@@ @@
[[table style="width: 100%; border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[row style="font-weight: bold; color: #fff; background-color: #666;"]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;width: 10%;"]]
编号
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;width: 20%;"]]
项目等级
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;width: 40%;"]]
等级描述
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;width: 30%;"]]
等级图标
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
001
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Ignosi**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
必须防止项目被发现——即使是被基金会发现。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/07/12/U3d2CQ.jpg]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
002
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Yesod**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目已整合于基金会的指挥机构。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Yesod]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
003
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Archon**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目可以被收容，但不应被收容。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Archon]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
004
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Hera**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目是敌对的，但对基金会极为有用。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Hera]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
005
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Uncontained**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
未收容
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Uncontained]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
006
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Keter**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目是极难去持续或确实地收容的异常
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Keter]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
007
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Apollyon*1**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目无法被收容，且会“积极”地去引发世界末日。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/07/12/U3d4uq.jpg]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
008
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Apollyon*2**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目无法被收容，且会“积极”地去引发世界末日。[[footnote]] 是的，我做了两个Apollyon，可能因为我太喜欢这个分级了（危 [[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/07/12/U3d5D0.png]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
009
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Tichonderoga**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目无法被收容，也无必要如此。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Ticonderoga]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
010
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Expained**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目通常为关于已经完全充分被理解并能以主流科学所解释，或是被揭穿/被错误地认知为异常的现象。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Explained]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
011
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Drygioni**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目目前正在接受监督者议会的正式调查，以确定其真伪。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/07/12/U3dBut.png]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
012
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Gevurah**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目危及基金会的内部结构，并限制了基金会履行其次级目标的能力。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Gevurah]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
013
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Eparch**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目非异常，但与异常有关。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Eparch]]
[[/cell]]
 
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
014
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Safe**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目为容易和安全地被收容的异常。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/07/12/U3ahTO.png]]
[[/cell]]

[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
015
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Decommissioned**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目已被基金会故意破坏或无异常化或已被处决。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/josephartwork/Decommissioned]]
[[/cell]]

[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
016
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
**Sköll**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
项目进程正导致无效化或不定期突破，或两者兼有。
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: 0 2px; text-align: center;border: 1px solid #888;"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/kksk/Spoll]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[/table]]
author: JosephJoestar
